newsitem.title: SPAIN: Madrid stocks erases gains, ends busy day lower.
newsitem.headline: Madrid stocks erases gains, ends busy day lower.

text.p: Spanish stocks end busy day lower, as Wall Street declines amid rumours, later denied, about the health of Russian President Boris Yeltsin.
"This morning the market opened strong, supported by bonds, which favoured an attack on on the 4,300 zone," a dealer said.
"But afterwards there was a violent correction of the future coinciding with a All Street and other bourse and it remains to be seen whether the market will consolidate or again try to rise."
* IBEX 35 share index off 19.28 points, or 0.45 percent at 4,257.78.
